noun.name: cup
noun.discription: a common household item used for drinking

object1.name: vase
object1.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a decorative container often used for holding flowers

object2.name: bowl
object2.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a round, open container used for serving food

object3.name: mug
object3.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a larger, often handle-equipped cup typically used for hot beverages

object4.name: jug
object4.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a large container with a handle and spout, used for holding and pouring liquids

object5.name: plate
object5.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a flat dish used for serving food

object6.name: glass
object6.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a drinking vessel made from glass, often used for water or alcoholic beverages

object7.name: pot
object7.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a container used for cooking or serving food, often with a handle and lid

object8.name: bottle
object8.discription: in parallel with 'cup', is a container with a narrow neck, used for holding liquids
